Hey. I had an idea to make a caterpillar-like segmented rover, but you can't have that without some kind of joint that allows two parts to be connected with some freedom of movement. Can this be done with stock KSP parts?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-24T22:58:53Z" title="07/24/2015 10:58  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 24, 2015</time> by Tricky14**
claw has some free pivot but that's pretty much it for stock. given that it's kraken bait you probably do want to grab some mods for your purpose.

> 
> Hey. I had an idea to make a caterpillar-like segmented rover, but you can't have that without some kind of joint that allows two parts to be connected with some freedom of movement. Can this be done with stock KSP parts?

[IR model rework](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65365-WIP-MSI-s-Infernal-Robotics-Model-Rework-%2828-04-2015%29-On-Hiatus) does have three uncontrolled joints, two pivotrons and one rotatron, those might be what you're looking for.

As for stock parts, aside from the Klaw (which is major kraken bait), no.
